fallbackResponse:
I understand you're asking about something specific. In demo mode, I'm showing cached responses to demonstrate capabilities.

Try these example commands:
â€¢ "Check server status" - View infrastructure health
â€¢ "Generate an image of a sunset" - See image generation
â€¢ "Create a React component" - Code generation demo
â€¢ "Restart discord-bot" - Container management
â€¢ "What can you do?" - Full capabilities list
